overview: When Sophia, a non-binary teenager, moves to a new town, they arenâ€™t counting on acceptance, and the last thing they expect to find is love. Rebellious and confident, Gen seems to be exactly what Sofia needs, but as they are drawn deeper and deeper into a world of punk, drugs and black magic, they will learn that bad love has a terrible cost: their life.
title: The Serpent's Nest
